msContents.summary: Unrelated fragments(3) list or account(4) list of names

supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 28 x 87, (A) 2lines, bottom margin (?), (B) blank, (2) 70 x 24, (A) 4 lines, margins (?), (B) traces, (3) 67 x 51, (A) 6 lines, no margins (?), (B) 7 lines, no margins, (4) 72 x 50, (A) 8 lines, left bottom margin, (B) blank, (5) 40 x 30, (A) 4 lines, no margins (?), (B) blank, (6) 39 x 20, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (7) 25 x 29, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 38 x 25, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) 6 lines, no margins, (9) 52 x 18, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 34 x 18, (A) 5 lines, bottom margin (?), (B) blank, (11) 24 x 17, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 50 x 62, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 50 x 36, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 6 lines, right margin, (14) 45 x 34, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (15) 45 x 26, (A) 7 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, right margin (?), (16) 36 x 44, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
